title: In the dark
creator_credit: David Eady, Ronald H. Riley and Ronald H Riley and Associates
brief_description: Shows what can be done to prevent a variety of accidents. Analyses one industrial accident and shows how easily the complacency of management, the foolishness of workers, domestic and social pressures can create danger - at work and at home - and can lead to years of heartbreak and hardship.
